metadata.description: The legendary, premier anthology is back! Dark Horse Presents returns with all-new stories by Neal Adams, Howard Chaykin, and Richard Corben; a new Concrete story by Paul Chadwick; a brand-new, all-color Finder story by Carla Speed McNeil; a prose piece from science-fiction legend Harlan Ellison; the return of Michael T. Gilbert's Mr. Monster; and much, much more!  Please note that unlike the print version, this digital version does not include Star Wars or Xerxes.
metadata.name: Dark Horse Presents
